coreNetworkArn.description: The ARN of the core network.

coreNetworkId.description: The ID of a core network.

edgeLocation.description: The edge location for the peer.

ownerAccountId.description: The ID of the account owner.

peeringType.description: The type of peering. This will be `TRANSIT_GATEWAY`.

resourceArn.description: The resource ARN of the peer.

tags.description: Key-value tags for the peering. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

transitGatewayArn.description: The ARN of the transit gateway for the peering request.

transitGatewayPeeringAttachmentId.description: The ID of the transit gateway peering attachment.

transitGatewayArn.description: The ARN of the transit gateway for the peering request.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering TransitGatewayPeering resources.
